scripts.test: npm run test:cpp && npm run test:ts
scripts.install-packages: npm install && cd implementations/typescript && npm install && cd ../.. && cmake-js install -d 'implementations/cpp'
scripts.build: cd implementations/typescript/src && npx tsc && cd ../.. && cmake-js build -j8 -d 'cpp'
scripts.debug-build: cd implementations/typescript/src && npx tsc && cd ../.. && cmake-js build -g -d 'cpp' --debug
